Önal P, Grün D, Adamidi C, Rybak A, Solana J, Mastrobuoni G, et al., 2012, Data from: Gene expression of pluripotency determinants is conserved between mammalian and planarian stem cells (The EMBO Journal (2012) 31, 2755–2769), http://dx.doi.org/10.1038/emboj.2012.110, Data available upon request from Önal et al.
